text:
Hi. I am trying the following hessian-free method to approximate the hessian vector product. It seems to work since it did not give an error, but I am not able to get the values from grads2 because it returns nothing if I try to index through it.
The output of dump(grads2) showed some values but I am not able to index through grads2 and receive those values. Any help please
```for i in params(m)
    v = Rademacher(i)
    grads2 = gradient(params(m)) do
        dot(transpose(grads[i]), v)
    end
    dump(grads2)
    println(grads2[i]) #prints nothing
end```
